product_name: Columbia Powder Keg Interchange 3-in-1 Down Jacket - Men's Plus Sizes
long_description: This technical waterproof, breathable shell in men's plus sizes has a minimalist design aesthetic. Zip in the toasty 650-fill down liner jacket and you've got impressive versatility for the hill.
short_description: This technical waterproof, breathable shell in men's plus sizes has a minimalist design aesthetic. Zip in the toasty 650-fill down liner jacket and you've got impressive versatility for the hill.
